file_results.false_positive_reason: The flagged line (subprocess.check_output("make -C src -f Makefile.vdf-client", shell=True)) is used to invoke a Makefile to build native code as part of the package installation process. This is a common and expected pattern in Python packages that wrap C/C++ code. The command does not execute arbitrary user input or download/execute remote code, and the Makefile is part of the package source. There is no evidence of malicious intent or behavior in this context.

detection_points.full_match: * This package is executing OS commands in the setup.py file at chiavdf-1.1.11/setup.py:74
